entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 09:30 AM NDT Thursday 05 May 2016
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 86 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C
Wind: NNE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning this afternoon. Fog patches developing this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 05 May 2016
